title: 134A.04 BOARD OF TRUSTEES, MEETINGS; TERM OF OFFICE.
text:
The trustees shall meet immediately after their selection and the board shall hold annual meetings thereafter. At each meeting it shall elect one of its members president and another member or the librarian secretary. The secretary shall act as the staff of the board and shall attend all meetings and prepare and distribute all agenda matters.
All members of the board of law library trustees shall hold office for a term to be set in the bylaws.
